attributes.action: Posthumous Pardon for William Wallace Guardian of Scotland,
attributes.additional_details: We call upon the Westminster Parliament to give a Posthumous Pardon to Sir William Wallace who was given a show trial for the pleasure of  King Edward 1 of England the murderer of Scots.  William Wallace was no Traitor as he held no allegiance to England, He was involved in a war to protect the citizens of Scotland against the murdering king of  England Edward 1.  We call upon you to put right this wrong and accept William Wallace as a true son of Scotland who fought and died to protect his people.
